content.question:
Answer all parts of the question that follows.

a) Identify ONE way in which class divisions affected the development of industrialized states in the period 1750–1900.

b) Identify ONE way in which class divisions affected the development of nonindustrialized states in the period 1750–1900.

c) Explain ONE similarity in the way that both industrialized and nonindustrialized states sought to reduce tensions caused by class divisions in the period 1750–1900.

frqParts.text:
Answer all parts of the question that follows.

a) Identify ONE way in which class divisions affected the development of industrialized states in the period 1750–1900.

b) Identify ONE way in which class divisions affected the development of nonindustrialized states in the period 1750–1900.

c) Explain ONE similarity in the way that both industrialized and nonindustrialized states sought to reduce tensions caused by class divisions in the period 1750–1900.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
